The cost of a movie ticket in 1950 was about US25¢. Today it's about $10+. That's 40X more.   The cost of a movie ticket in 2011 cost about 3 #bitcoin. Today it's about 0.001 BTC. That's about 3000X less.  Deflation vs Inflation of currency.  Choose your currency carefully.
